metadata.title: CVE-2016-2511 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WebSVN 2.3.3 and earlier allowsremote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the pathparameter to log.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2511` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

websvn - 2.3.3-1.1+deb7u2build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: websvn package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3.3-1.1+deb7u2build0.14.04.1').
